name: Suspicious Fruity Trio
desc: A dessert with a romantic flair. The meringue has been baked to form a passable shape â€” albeit after several failed attempts that resulted in suspicious, burnt lumps. Unfortunately though, the cooking took so long that the Bulle Fruit now grimaces with frustration and no longer tastes sweet.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Fruity Trio
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fruity Trio.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Fruity Trio
customize.desc: A dessert with a romantic flair. Add jam and fillings made from Bulle Fruit into tart shells and spread some meringue over the top before baking in the oven. The dish offers three fruity aromas all in one bite, making it a top choice for post-meal snacks.

customize.name: Delicious Fruity Trio
customize.desc: A dessert with a romantic flair. The crispy and flaky tart shell and refreshing fruit fillings melt in your mouth. The harmonious coalescence of brown and white colors on the meringue reminds one of a stretch of gilded cloud in the warm sunlight. A pleasant surprise to your tastebuds indeed.
